column1: 271299,Parliamentary Counsel,,"Prepare drafts of amendments, government policies, laws, rules, regulations, budgets, programs and procedures
column3: Identify implications for cases from legal precedents or other legal information
column7: Analyse and understand the local and national implications of proposed legislation
column11: Interview claimants to gather information related to legal proceedings
column13: Research relevant legal materials to aid decision making
column15: Evaluate information related to legal matters in public or personal records
column17: Develop programs, policies or services that are culturally appropriate
column19: Analyse impact of legal or regulatory changes
column23: Meet with individuals involved in legal processes to provide information and clarify issues",nan
